verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> (this <S%H2063><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> that shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to you for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> even the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> with the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof:)

Then your south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> shall be from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> along by the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> and your south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> shall be the outmost <S%H7097><s%> coast <S%H7097><s%> of the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> eastward: <S%H6924><s%>

And your border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn <S%H5437><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H6137><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> to Zin: <S%H6790><s%> and the going <S%H8444><s%> forth <S%H8444><s%> thereof shall be from the south <S%H5045><s%> to Kadeshbarnea, <S%H6947><s%> and shall go <S%H3318><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> to Hazaraddar, <S%H2692><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> to Azmon: <S%H6111><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall fetch a compass <S%H5437><s%> from Azmon <S%H6111><s%> to the river <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out of it shall be at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And as for the western <S%H3220><s%> border, <S%H1366><s%> you shall even have <S%H1961><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> for a border: <S%H1366><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> shall be your west <S%H3220><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border: <S%H1366><s%> from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> you shall point <S%H8376><s%> out for you mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor: <S%H2023><s%>

From mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> you shall point <S%H8376><s%> out your border to the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> forth <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be to Zedad: <S%H6657><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> to Ziphron, <S%H2202><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out of it shall be at Hazarenan: <S%H2704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>
And you shall point <S%H184><s%> out your east <S%H6924><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> from Hazarenan <S%H2704><s%> to Shepham: <S%H8221><s%>

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Shepham <S%H8221><s%> to Riblah, <S%H7247><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6924><s%> of Ain; <S%H5871><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall descend, <S%H3381><s%> and shall reach <S%H4229><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> eastward: <S%H6924><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out of it shall be at the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea: <S%H3220><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> shall be your land <S%H776><s%> with the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof round <S%H5439><s%> about.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> by lot, <S%H1486><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe: <S%H4294><s%>

For the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7206><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance; and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>

The two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%> eastward, <S%H6924><s%> toward the sun rise. <S%H4217><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to you: Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of every tribe, <S%H4294><s%> to divide <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> by inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>
And the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> are these: <S%H428><s%> Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh. <S%H3312><s%>
And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Shemuel <S%H8050><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>
Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Elidad <S%H449><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chislon. <S%H3692><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Bukki <S%H1231><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jogli. <S%H3020><s%>

The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Hanniel <S%H2592><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ephod. <S%H641><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphtan. <S%H8204><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parnach. <S%H6535><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Paltiel <S%H6409><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzan. <S%H5821><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Ahihud <S%H282><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomi. <S%H8015><s%>
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Pedahel <S%H6300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are they whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to divide the inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
